email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Aamir,

We are looking to ship 150,000 MT of iron ore from Tubarão to Qingdao. Could you provide a rate and vessel availability for a laycan of October 20-25?

Best regards,
Lucia Fernandez

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucia,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel MV OCEAN GIANT, 180,000 DWT, LOA 300m, at a rate of USD 22.50 per MT CFR. The laycan is October 22-25. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Aamir Khan

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Aamir,

Thank you for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Could you consider USD 21.00 per MT? Also, can the laycan be extended to October 26?

Best regards,
Lucia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucia,

I can adjust the rate to USD 21.50 per MT, and extend the laycan to October 26. The vessel is in high demand, so I recommend confirming soon.

Best regards,
Aamir

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Aamir,

We agree to the rate of USD 21.50 per MT and the laycan of October 22-26. Please proceed with the booking and send us the contract for review.

Best regards,
Lucia

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarão to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Lucia,

Thank you for your confirmation. I will send the contract within the next hour. The demurrage rate is USD 20,000 per day.

Best regards,
Aamir
